channel.title: When will XRD be tradable on Binance / Coinbase / Kraken / Other exchanges?
channel.description:
The Radix team can only communicate new exchange listings a short time before the listing actually takes place.
Exploratory talks of potential listing or on-going negotiations of pending listing are all done under NDA (agreement to not communicate the listing under certain terms).
